scenario_text.value: What is this place?

There’s a hole in the wall. It looked
suspicious to me, and when I checked it...

It was connected to this area. Did you know
about this, Jijimon?

I’m afraid this is the first I’ve heard of
it.

Takuma... I felt something off about this
place last time we were here.

Oh yeah, you did mention that, didn’t you.
Any idea what it could be?

Umm... I dunno, but it’s super strong. I’m
shaking just sensing it...

It doesn’t feel hostile or anything, it’s
just...

(If we stick around here, the enemy’s bound
to catch up with us.)
(What should we do?!)
Look for other paths?
Take them head-on!
Keep going ahead.
Look for other paths?
Are there any other paths?

This is the only one we’ve found, at the very
least.

The bad guys might catch up while we look for
another way forward...
Yeah, you’re probably right.
Take them head-on!

If the enemy’s coming from behind, all the
better. We’ll take them out here.

Hold on, we don’t know if there are any
ahead. We could get flanked on both sides.
Ah, that’s true...
Keep going ahead.

The enemy’s following us, we should keep on
going for now.

You sure about that? No telling if we got
more of ’em waiting on ahead.

If that’s true, we better hurry. It’ll be bad
news if we get sandwiched between them.
Ahh, yeah that’s true.

If we’re gonna get stuck between them either
way, might as forge on ahead.
Let’s head out, everyone!
